title: What decides our taste?
description: What makes us like the flavours we like?

vocabItems.definition: investigate something in a new way in order to increase the range of your knowledge, understanding or experience
unable to see the difference between certain colours, especially green and red
without purpose or meaning, and a waste of time

vocabItems.word: I would say that, wouldn't I?
vocabItems.definition: of course I would say that; used to imply there's some reason that what the speaker is saying is obviously biased towards them
based on personal opinions and feelings rather than on objective facts
